wiki.content: Brendon Urie came up with the original idea for this song before the band had even started touring on their 2008 album Pretty. Odd. He told MTV News: "It was just sitting in my laptop collecting figurative dust on my hard drive, not really doing much." (Source The Ballad of Mona Lisa Songfacts). User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Brendon Urie came up with the original idea for this song before the band had even started touring on their 2008 album Pretty. Odd. He told MTV News: "It was just sitting in my laptop collecting figurative dust on my hard drive, not really doing much." (Source The Ballad of Mona Lisa Songfacts).

track.name: The Ballad of Mona Lisa
comments: I love the music video to!

She paints her fingers with a close precision
He starts to notice empty bottles of gin
And takes a moment to assess the sin she's paid for
I can't stop listening this song, it's just so fucking amazing <3
Let the sun rain down on me!!
Whooaa Mona Lisa! ♥ 1st Time I Heard The Song Is When I Saw The Video And I Fell In Love With It!
